item.title: Help with a Shop -- Again [Rep++ any1 who helps!]
item.dc:creator: @knight12374 knight12374
item.description:
@knight12374 wrote:

Hey guys. I need some help.

In shops.cfg, I've made a shop for donator items (& a shop for billion coins) which are numbered 52 (and 48).
Okay, so shop 52 for donor items uses NPC 535 (Fairy Shop Assistant). Here's the code I put in client.class:
[code]if(NPCID == 535){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 52; 
}[/code]
It is amungst the other shops, here's the full shop chunk:
[code]if(NPCID == 545){
openTan();
}
if(NPCID == 3295){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 5; 
}
if(NPCID == 666){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1; 
}
if(NPCID == 640){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 47; 
}
if(NPCID == 290){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 50; 
}
if(NPCID == 580){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 51; 
}
if(NPCID == 535){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 52; 
}
if(NPCID == 2538){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 4; 
}[/code]
However, whenever I make this change I get this error report when I run the server:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Cl
1768779887 in class file client
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.define
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.define
        at java.security.SecureClassLoa
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.defi
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.acce
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.ru
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.ru
        at java.security.AccessControll
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.find
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadCl
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLo
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadCl
        at server.main(server.java:128)[/code]
Soooooooo basically I need someone to help me get my shop working in my client.class.
It would be much appreciated. Here's the full detail you'll need if you want to fix it:
[code]//This is in client.class, but causes error seen above.
if(NPCID == 535){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 52; 
}[/code]
[code]This is the shops I want to work: 48 and 52.[/code]
[code]NPC # for 52: 535 NPC # for 48: 534[/code]
[code]Autospawn dataaa:
spawn = 535	3364	3312	0	0	0	0	0	1 //This is for shop 52
spawn = 534	3366	3312	0	0	0	0	0	1 //This is for shop 48
[/code]
That's about all I can think of. If anyone can help me, I will put on my gravestone "THX (urname)!" and Rep++.

Hey guys. I need some help.

In shops.cfg, I’ve made a shop for donator items (& a shop for billion coins) which are numbered 52 (and 48).
Okay, so shop 52 for donor items uses NPC 535 (Fairy Shop Assistant). Here’s the code I put in client.class:

if(NPCID == 535){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 52; }
It is amungst the other shops, here’s the full shop chunk:

if(NPCID == 545){ openTan(); } if(NPCID == 3295){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } if(NPCID == 666){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; } if(NPCID == 640){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 47; } if(NPCID == 290){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 50; } if(NPCID == 580){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 51; } if(NPCID == 535){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 52; } if(NPCID == 2538){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 4; }
However, whenever I make this change I get this error report when I run the server:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Cl 1768779887 in class file client at java.lang.ClassLoader.define at java.lang.ClassLoader.define at java.security.SecureClassLoa at java.net.URLClassLoader.defi at java.net.URLClassLoader.acce at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.ru at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.ru at java.security.AccessControll at java.net.URLClassLoader.find at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadCl at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLo at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadCl at server.main(server.java:128)
Soooooooo basically I need someone to help me get my shop working in my client.class.
It would be much appreciated. Here’s the full detail you’ll need if you want to fix it:

//This is in client.class, but causes error seen above. if(NPCID == 535){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 52; }

Autospawn dataaa: spawn = 535 3364 3312 0 0 0 0 0 1 //This is for shop 52 spawn = 534 3366 3312 0 0 0 0 0 1 //This is for shop 48
That’s about all I can think of. If anyone can help me, I will put on my gravestone “THX (urname)!” and Rep++.

Read full topic
